snippet: World number one Novak Djokovic, the only member of the so-called "Big Four" to reach Friday's semi-finals of the U.S. Open, also has the distinction of being the least tested of the last four at Flushing Meadows....
lead_paragraph: World number one Novak Djokovic, the only member of the so-called "Big Four" to reach Friday's semi-finals of the U.S. Open, also has the distinction of being the least tested of the last four at Flushing Meadows.

headline.print_headline: Rested Djokovic Big Favorite Against Monfils
headline.main: Rested Djokovic Big Favorite Against Monfils
